thread.title: Highlights from Bill Walton, Dick Vitale game
thread.title_full: Highlights from Bill Walton, Dick Vitale game

author: USA TODAY
title: Highlights from Bill Walton, Dick Vitale game
text:
Highlights from Bill Walton, Dick Vitale game "It was a fab time." Post to Facebook Highlights from Bill Walton, Dick Vitale game "It was a fab time."  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/bill-walton-dick-vitale-espn-cavaliers-lady-gaga-lebron-pacers-call-espn-bonkers-video-highlights-pasch/   Highlights from Bill Walton, Dick Vitale game Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY 12:14   
Dave Pasch had quite the job. (Photo: Dick Vitale, Twitter) 
Depending on who you are, these could be seen as highlights, or they could be seen as lowlights. The reviews were mixed on Twitter while Bill Walton and Dick Vitale teamed up to call the Cavaliers vs. Pacers game on ESPN on Wednesday night. I don't see how you can really hate any of this, so we're going with highlights. 
Overall, it was a little crazy - OK, maybe it got really crazy. Here are some of the wackiest moments: 1. Dave Pasch really tried his best to hold everything together 
"Hi everybody, alongside Hall of Famers Dick Vitale and Bill Walton, I'm Dave Pasch, and yes, this is really happening." rpmsports18: Poor Dave ESPN NBA Basketball: Pacers at Cavaliers https://t.co/hdlGAQ7vzL pic.twitter.com/XGFXnRjGtC 
Walton to Pasch at one point: "We'll give it to - what is your name over there - to take us to commercial again with yet another timeout?" mattclapp: Poor Pasch lol ESPN NBA Basketball: Pacers at Cavaliers https://t.co/QQjGKwbEZc pic.twitter.com/akHEMVJyJD â€” Awful Announcing (@awfulannouncing) February 16, 2017 2. "Lady Gaga is awesome. What she did was electrifying at the Super Bowl" sonofthebronx: Dick Vitale and Bill Walton talk about Lady Gaga ESPN NBA Basketball: Pacersâ€¦ https://t.co/BeHYsulTYf pic.twitter.com/akZnhUeWTe 3. Nothing was held back 
These are just a couple of examples - there were many more. 
Walton said he's fine with Carmelo Anthony going to any team, so long as it's not one of the teams that he likes. sonofthebronx: Bill Walton on potential Carmelo Anthony trade: "As longâ€¦ ESPN NBA Basketbalâ€¦ https://t.co/MMn4xW5dUV pic.twitter.com/FV8jpPMBLK 
Walton says a certain play was the worst of Derrick Williams' career, then adds that he has never seen Derrick Williams play before. sonofthebronx: Bill Walton on Derrick Williams: "One of the four worst â€¦ ESPN NBA Basketbalâ€¦ https://t.co/DlEE6TQ0WU pic.twitter.com/phLpBWLIx6 4. Really, really holding nothing back 
Walton's mic was cut at one point â€¦ because he called a producers "Dr. Slave Driver." Bill Walton calls game producer "Dr. Slave Driver", mic gets cut, Dave Pasch abt to drop his headset and go home ðŸ’€ â€” #GonzoForLonzo (@World_Wide_Wob) February 16, 2017 5. In awe of LeBron 
Vitale and Walton called LeBron James' high school game 15 years ago , so this is a special moment for them to be able to do this. They made it clear that James really impressed them with his 31 points, five rebounds and four assists in a Cavs win. Bill Walton on the call asking the real questions ðŸ˜‚ pic.twitter.com/8S2F7rErCk â€” NBA on ESPN (@ESPNNBA) February 16, 2017 
Walton said, "I can look back and be able to say that I was there the night that LeBron laid Indiana down." The best part of Bill Walton's summation is how it failed to move @DavePasch emotionally. pic.twitter.com/eRK0ZlkJtq â€” Matt Schick (@ESPN_Schick) February 16, 2017 
Then, when it was all over, Vitale tweeted out a couple of great photos. One of him with Walton and Pasch, and the other with Khloe Kardashian with the perfect caption: "It was a fab time." â€” Dick Vitale (@DickieV) February 16, 2017 Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/bill-walton-dick-vitale-espn-cavaliers-lady-gaga-lebron-pacers-call-espn-bonkers-video-highlights-pasch/ Most Popular
